owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

add(uint256,address).notice: Add a new proxy. Can only be called by the owner.

addProxy(address).notice: Owner should add proxy first, then proxy can add its pools.

dev(address).notice: Update dev address by the previous dev.

getReward(address,address).notice: Get proxy's amount of total reward

poolInfo(address,address).notice: Info of each pool of proxy.

set(address,uint256).notice: Update the given proxy's KST allocation point. Can only be called by the owner.

startBlock().notice: The block number when KST mining starts.

totalAllocPoint().notice: Total allocation poitns. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all proxys.
